item.title: Bank of America says buy the dip in this gambling stock despite NJ tax hike fears
item.description: Investors might consider buying shares of Flutter Entertainment ahead of its quarterly results next Tuesday, according to Bank of America.

item.title: Microsoft just formed the foreboding 'death cross' chart pattern
item.description: A death cross is a price chart pattern that forms when a stock's 50-day moving average slips below its 200-day moving average.

item.title: Here are Wednesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Home Depot, Super Micro, Alibaba, American Airlines & more
item.description: Here are Wednesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: An entire trading ecosystem built around Nvidia alone is poised for a test again
item.description: With the possible exception of Tesla, no other stock generates the kind of short-term trading interest Nvidia does.

item.title: Citi upgrades this telecom stock poised to rally more than 40%
item.description: A number of catalysts may send lagging Lumen Technologies shares higher in the months ahead, according to Citi.
